column1: The Purple Pig////Food: The service was a bit rushed
column2: but understandably so since they were literally closing in 25 minutes haha. My goal was to not order anything that we already ordered the last time we were here
column3: which was difficult since we damn near ordered the entire menu last time. Under pressure
column4: we just shot from the hip and ordered some random items
column5: which turned out to be great.
